#summary List of tools and items that are useful
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation
=Modeling=
3dsMax users:
  * [http://www.wunderboy.org/sourceapps.php#max9_smd SMD Export] (V9)
  * [http://www.chaosincarnate.net/cannonfodder/cftools.htm SMD Export] (V6/7/8)
  * [http://www.wunderboy.org/sourceapps.php#max_vtf VTF (texture) Support] (V6/7/8/9)

Any Modeler:
  * [http://www.wunderboy.org/apps/guistudiomdl2.php GUI StudiMDL, much better than the SDK studio MDL.]
  * [http://www.chaosincarnate.net/cannonfodder/cftools.htm Another MDL tool, this time capable of decompiling also, however outdated compared to studiMDL]
  * [http://www.chaosincarnate.net/cannonfodder/cftools.htm MDL decompiler]
= Texture Artists =
  * [http://www.wunderboy.org/sourceapps.php#vtf_shell VTF shell extensions, (thumbnails in explorer)]
  * [http://nemesis.thewavelength.net/index.php?p=41 VTF edit, used for conversion of VTF textures]
  * [http://www.gimp.org/ GIMP, free image editing software, very good.]
= All Users =
  * [http://nemesis.thewavelength.net/index.php?p=25 GCF scape, great tool allowing access to all files from any Source game on steam, good for ripping reference models textures and alike from a game]
